name: Hellrobe (Autoghost)
author: Mero
info: A vile wizzrobe of endgame difficulty
description: I took a wizzrobe and made it change attack and movement styles as well as gave it ice magic too spice things up a bit.
setup: Create a wizzrobe enemy, give it the sword weapon and make it either teleporting or phasing, and set attribbute 5 to the number of frames between switching to another wizzrobe behavior (chooses from the built in wizzrobe IDs: Mirror, Fire, Bat, Wind, as well as itself. HP will be copied as well as defenses and sprite. Ghost_Replace is used her.Create a ring item with a Level of 255 (max) and set the palette to whatever you want Link's frozen ESP palette to be. In the classic tileset this is 14 by default.
